text: Nza ana kaŋgiap, nza kaŋgi, ana guigira bigɨna vhuuŋ guarara fara muuŋgi. Mba bigɨna vhuuŋ, nza Zisas farasarigi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgi, mba bigɨn nzan vhen ki. Nza nuianan muuŋgi ndari fara muuŋgim, Fhe Bakɨme won ŋkɨɨa gum bigir vhuuin nzan ndavir vheri ga vhuigim, nta givigi fara muuŋgiap nzan ki. Nta nzan kav kɨrar him, mbe mba ŋkasŋka bakɨme garav, mbe kaŋgi, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨme ŋkasŋka bakɨme ma, ana nzan ŋkasŋka fhuvara.
